name: Curiosity Killed The Explorer
description:
"Curiosity Killed The Explorer"

You were driving home one late night. Nearby de-forestation has revealed an uncanny cave. Authorities have yet to block the entrance, so you decide to take a look before it is inevitably closed down. What could go wrong?

- - -

Controls:

WASD to move around

MOUSE to look around

E to interact

LEFT CLICK to light a match
